scripts.dev: gulp build & cross-env HTTPPORT=30001 HTTPSPORT=30003 NODE_ENV=dev BACKEND_AUTH=N node ./bin/www
scripts.uat: gulp build & cross-env HTTPPORT=30001 HTTPSPORT=30003 NODE_ENV=uat BACKEND_AUTH=Y node ./bin/www
scripts.prod: gulp build & cross-env HTTPPORT=30001 HTTPSPORT=30003 NODE_ENV=prod BACKEND_AUTH=Y node ./bin/www
scripts.pm2-dev: gulp build & cross-env HTTPPORT=30001 HTTPSPORT=30003 NODE_ENV=dev BACKEND_AUTH=N pm2 start pm2.start.json
scripts.pm2-uat: gulp build & cross-env HTTPPORT=30001 HTTPSPORT=30003 NODE_ENV=uat BACKEND_AUTH=Y pm2 start pm2.start.json
scripts.pm2-prod: gulp build & cross-env HTTPPORT=30001 HTTPSPORT=30003 NODE_ENV=prod BACKEND_AUTH=Y pm2 start pm2.start.json
